boardgame.name: Le collier de la reine
Das Halsband der Königin
Queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Necklace
boardgame.description: From the slums, where purse-snatchers and courtesans work their respective trades, to the inner salons of the Louvre, where confessors, royal astrologers, musketeers, and court favorites mingle and scheme in hushed conversations, the position of King's Jeweler has suddenly become a lot more dangerous!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set in Paris, on the eve of the French Revolution, Queen's Necklace is a game of gem-selling, influence, and intrigue at the court. Two to four players compete in the role of royal jeweler to sell rare jewels to the Queen and her court._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Jeweler's loupe in hand, you must decide how best to spend your hard-earned ducats: acquiring beautiful gems (diamonds, emeralds, and rubies); or buying the favors of the various court followers. After three years of craftsmanship, the jeweler who sells the most precious gems and builds the largest fortune will receive the coveted title of King's Jeweler and a place at the court!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Dukes of Dice - Ep. 62 - Rise of the Dress Lords
Episode 62- The Golden Ages and Angry Gaming

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Prefer PayPal or Venmo Buyers pay actual shipping costs. I can give an estimate if you list your zip with your bid and send me a geekmail. All games will be shipped via USPS. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m open to potentially using other options if preferred. I will only charge for shipping charges and will refund any difference if I initially use an estimate. International buyers are welcome, but be aware that international shipping these days is not cheap! I will only use USPS to ship international. If you are relatively close by and wish to pick up the game from me in person in Los Angeles, CA, that can also be arranged. I also do a lot of driving for work, mainly on the Westside and would be more than happy to drop the game off if you live in that neck of the woods...or meet you halfway if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t.
